Scanning for Hue Bridges over SSDP
This scan multicasts a SSDP request over UDP and waits for responses.
Hue Bridges regularly check in with the Hue server, this scan contacts the Hue server for checked in devices on the local network.
Retrieving further details from found Hue Bridges
Connects to the IP addresses of found devices for more device info.

Scans every IP address on the local network (unless the subnet mask is extremely large) - this scan is more CPU intensive so only runs if the previous two scans could not complete or produced inconsistent results.
